div.div: Reconstructions for slowdown period 2, 1941–1975, where the time series include the lead-in period 1939–1940.
div.p: ( A) Average reconstruction of GST for slowdown period 2: 1941–1975. Thick trend lines are for 1941–1975, and thin lines are for 1951–1975. Otherwise as for Fig. 2A. ( B) Reconstruction of WMO GST for slowdown period 2: 1941–1975. Otherwise as for Fig. 2B. ( C) Linear component of total temperature change for slowdown period 2: 1951–1975. Stars denote significance at the 1% level or better. Otherwise as for Fig. 2C.
